FuncDef: This command configures an IPv4 filter ID that is applied to all ingress packets entering the VPLS or I-VPLS service. The filter overrides any existing ingress IPv4 filter applied to SAPs or SDP bindings for packets associated with the routing IP interface. The override filter is optional and when it is not defined or it is removed. The IPv4 routed packets use any existing ingress IPv4 filter on the VPLS virtual port.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP filter ID. This parameter is required when executing the v4-routed-override-filter command. The specified filter ID must exist as an IPv4 filter within the system or the override command fails.
